channel.title: My Windows Vps Isn't online? rep++
channel.description:
Just bought a windows vps, Connected to it with Windows Remote Desktop Connection. Installed java and all other programs.
Then i took my Client changed all the ip stuff to my VPS IP, tryed it on my PC and couldn't connect.
How to fck can i Put it online on my vps, its automaitcly port forwarded right? or do i have to open port 5555 or port 43594 anywhere? in my firewall?

item.title: My Windows Vps Isn't online? rep++
item.dc:creator: @infinitymagic infinitymagic
item.description:
@infinitymagic wrote:

The port is already open,
The problem is i think you need to allow it in windows firewall.

Read full topic
item.source: My Windows Vps Isn't online? rep++

item.title: My Windows Vps Isn't online? rep++
item.dc:creator: @Mattiaspope Mattiaspope
item.description:
@Mattiaspope wrote:

Ask them to portforward port 43594 or whichever port you’re using. It should work then, Make sure you’re using the vps ip as well.

Read full topic
item.source: My Windows Vps Isn't online? rep++
